ScriptGroup.name: AR core
ScriptGroup.script: ar = ar or {} ar.file = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/AR system" if not lfs.attributes(ar.file) then lfs.mkdir(ar.file) end ar.login = function() sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Add ["Comm 1", "IRE 1", "Comm.Channel 1", "IRE.Target 1", "IRE.Rift 1"] ]] ) send(" ") end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.welcome", "ar.login")

Script.name: affliction list by cures
Script.script: ar.cureList = { might = { "paralysis", "weariness", "haemophilia", "brokenrightleg", "brokenleftleg", "brokenrightarm", "brokenleftarm", }, concentrate = {"disrupted"}, compose = {"fear"}, wake = {"sleeping"}, immunity = {"voyria"}, stand = {"prone"}, ginger = {"temperedcholeric", "temperedmelancholic", "temperedphlegmatic", "temperedsanguine"}, bellwort = { "generosity", "indifference", "justice", "lovers", "pacified", "peace", "retribution", "timeloop", }, pear = {"pressure"}, body = { "anorexia", "burning", "calcifiedtorso", "heartseed", "hypothermia", "itching", "mildtrauma", "selarnia", "serioustrauma", }, aurum = { "asthma", "clumsiness", "healthleech", "hypochondria", "parasite", "rebbies", "sensitivity", "weariness", }, restoration = { "calcifiedskull", ScriptGroup.name: skills

Script.name: skills lists
Script.script: ar.skills.byClass = { alchemist = {[1] = {"alchemy"}, [2] = {"physiology"}, [3] = {"sublimation", "formulation"}}, apostate = {[1] = {"evileye"}, [2] = {"necromancy"}, [3] = {"apostasy"}}, bard = {[1] = {"voicecraft"}, [2] = {"swashbuckling"}, [3] = {"harmonics"}}, blademaster = {[1] = {"twoarts"}, [2] = {"striking"}, [3] = {"shindo"}}, depthswalker = {[1] = {"aeonics"}, [2] = {"shadowmancy"}, [3] = {"terminus"}}, druid = {[1] = {"groves"}, [2] = {"metamorphosis"}, [3] = {"reclamation"}}, infernal = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"oppression"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, jester = {[1] = {"tarot"}, [2] = {"pranks"}, [3] = {"puppetry"}}, magi = {[1] = {"elementalism"}, [2] = {"crystalism"}, [3] = {"artificing"}}, monk = {[1] = {"tekura", "shikudo"}, [2] = {"kaido"}, [3] = {"telepathy"}}, occultist = {[1] = {"occultism"}, [2] = {"tarot"}, [3] = {"domination"}}, paladin = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"devotion"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, pariah = {[1] = {"memorium"}, [2] = {"pestilence"}, [3] = {"charnel"}}, priest = {[1] = {"spiritualtiy"}, [2] = {"devotion"}, [3] = {"zeal"}}, psion = {[1] = {"weaving"}, [2] = {"psionics"}, [3] = {"emulation"}}, runewarden = {[1] = {"weaponmastery"}, [2] = {"runelore"}, [3] = {"chivalry"}}, sentinel = {[1] = {"metamorphosis"}, [2] = {"runelore"}, [3] = {"skirmishing"}}, serpent = {[1] = {"subterfuge"}, [2] = {"venom"}, [3] = {"hypnosis"}}, shaman = {[1] = {"spiritlore"}, [2] = {"curses"}, [3] = {"vodun"}}, sylvan = {[1] = {"propagation"}, [2] = {"groves"}, [3] = {"weatherweaving"}}, } ar.skills.misc = {"vision", "survival", "tattoos", "weaponry", "riding", "seafaring", "attainment"}

Script.name: get skill groups
Script.script: ar.skills.iHave = function(_) local dontCare = { "Philosophy", "Galvanism", "Fitness", "Antidotes", "Frost", "Thermology", "Constitution", "Avoidance", } ar.mySkills = {} if ars.myInfo.class then if io.exists(ar.file .. "/skills/skill list " .. ars.myInfo.class) then table.load(ar.file .. "/skills/skill list " .. ars.myInfo.class, ar.mySkills) return else sendGMCP("Char.Skills.Get " .. yajl.to_string({})) send(" ") end end send(" ") if gmcp.Char.Skills then for i = 1, #gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups do if table.contains(dontCare, gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[i].name) == false then ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[i].name:lower()] = {} end end raiseEvent("ar.gotSkillGroups") end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.welcome", "ar.skills.iHave") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ars.changeClass", "ar.skills.iHave")

Script.name: event handlers
Script.script: ar.skills.getSkills = function(event) if event == "gmcp.Char.Skills.List" then for _, v in pairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list) do sendGMCP( "Char.Skills.Get " .. yajl.to_string({group = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group, name = v}) ) end raiseEvent("ar.gotSkillGroups") end if event == "ar.gotSkillGroups" then for k, _ in pairs(ar.mySkills) do if table.is_empty(ar.mySkills[k]) == true then sendGMCP("Char.Skills.Get " .. yajl.to_string({group = k})) send(" ") break end end end if event == "gmcp.Char.Skills.Info" then if string.find(gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.info, "*** You have not yet learned this ability **") then ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.group][gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.skill] = false else ar.mySkills[gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.group][gmcp.Char.Skills.Info.skill] = true end end table.save(ar.file .. "/skills/skill list "..ars.myInfo.class, ar.mySkills) end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Skills.List", "ar.skills.getSkills") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotSkillGroups", "ar.skills.getSkills") registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Skills.Info", "ar.skills.getSkills")

ScriptGroup.name: installation
ScriptGroup.script:
ar.install = ar.install or {} if not lfs.attributes(ar.file .. "/installation") then lfs.mkdir(ar.file .. "/installation") end if io.exists(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable") then table.load(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable", ar.install) end ar.install.installed = ar.install.installed or false
ar.install.progress = ar.install.progress or {installedEcho = false, curesets = false, treescenarios = false, deletepriorsettings = false}

Script.name: delete prior settings and install new curesets
Script.script: ar.install.deletePriorSettings = function(event) if ar.install.installed == false then if event == "ar.gotCuresets" then if table.is_empty(ar.curesetList) == false then for _, v in pairs(ar.curesetList) do send("cureset delete " .. v .. " confirm") end end ar.curesetList = nil ar.install.curesetInstall() end if event == "ar.gotTreeScenarios" and table.is_empty(ar.treeScenarios) == false then for _, v in pairs(ar.treeScenarios) do send("curing tree scenario delete " .. v .. " confirm") end ar.treeScenarios = nil ar.install.treeScenarios() end raiseEvent("ar.install.deletedPriorSettings") end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotCuresets", "ar.install.deletePriorSettings") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.gotTreeScenarios", "ar.install.deletePriorSettings")

Script.name: tree scenarios
Script.script: ar.install.treeScenarios = function() local t = { momentum = {affcount = {3}}, antiscythe = {afflictions = {"impatience"}, affcount = {2}}, occultist = {affcount = {3}, afflictions = {"whisperingmadness"}}, venomlock = {afflictions = {"asthma", "slickness", "anorexia", "impatience"}}, normal = {affcount = {2}}, } for k, _ in pairs(t) do send("curing tree scenario new " .. k) for x, _ in pairs(t[k]) do send("curing tree scenario " .. x .. " "..k.." " .. table.concat(t[k][x], " ")) end end raiseEvent("ar.install.treeScenarioInstall") end

Script.name: cureset install
Script.script: ar.install.curesetInstall = function() local t = {"duel", "group", "hunting", "burst", "aeon", "custom"} local tempString = "curing priority" for _, v in pairs(t) do for aff, prio in pairs(ar.install.curesetBase.affs) do tempString = tempString .. " " .. aff .. " " .. prio end send("cureset new " .. v) send(tempString) send("curing priority defence list reset") tempString = "curing priority" for _, x in pairs(ar.classList) do ars.curesets[x] = ars.curesets[x] or {} ars.curesets[x][v] = table.deepcopy(ar.install.curesetBase) end end raiseEvent("ar.install.curesetInstall") end

3, enlightenment = 26, isolation = 26, mindclamp = 26, penitence = 26, weakenedmind = 26, parasite = 12, epilepsy = 13, weariness = 12, pressure = 12, dizziness = 17, shadowmadness = 13, guilt = 8, haemophilia = 13, temperedsanguine = 16, dissonance = 13, masochism = 17, clumsiness = 12, darkshade = 13, stupidity = 17, healthleech = 12, agoraphobia = 17, tenderskin = 8, claustrophobia = 17, = 13, addiction = 13, temperedmelancholic = 15, spiritburn = 8, lethargy = 13, lovers = 17, shyness = 17, sensitivity = 14, paranoia = 17, scytherus = 15, pacified = 17, unweavingmind = 7, dementia = 17, hypersomnia = 17, loneliness = 17, temperedphlegmatic = 16, impatience = 5, hypochondria = 6, hallucinations = 15, temperedcholeric = 16, asthma = 4, manaleech = 11, disloyalty = 11, aeon = 2, whisperingmadness = 23, slickness = 5, unweavingspirit = 15, tension = 11, deadening = 11, hellsight = 3, dazed = 12, mangledhead = 22, calcifiedskull = 22, selarnia = 25, mangledrightarm = 20, shivering = 25, laceratedthroat = 25, burning = 25, skullfractures = 11, concussion = 15, mangledleftleg = 12, brokenleftarm = 16, torntendons = 12, mangledrightleg = 12, heartseed = 6, serioustrauma = 6, brokenrightleg = 14, stuttering = 25, damagedrightleg = 11, dazzled = 25, wristfractures = 13, scalded = 26, frozen = 25, brokenrightarm = 16, slashedthroat = 24, damagedleftleg = 11, damagedrightarm = 15, anorexia = 4, damagedleftarm = 15, hypothermia = 13, itching = 10, crackedribs = 14, damagedhead = 15, mangledleftarm = 20, calcifiedtorso = 22, crushedthroat = 12, mildtrauma = 9, brokenleftleg = 14, coldfate = 26, petrified = 26, fear = 20, internalbleeding = 26, degenerate = 26, silver = 26, blackout = 25, webbed = 6, solarburn = 26, demonstain = 26, lapsingconsciousness = 26, bound = 6, airfisted = 26, flamefisted = 26, unconsciousness = 26, enmesh = 26, numbedleftarm = 26, hindered = 26, icefisted = 26, transfixation = 6, sleeping = 2, blistered = 26, bruisedribs = 26, hecatecurse = 26, latched = 3, vinewreathed = 26, corruption = 26, numbedrightarm = 26, entangled = 6, asphyxiating = 26, lightbind = 26, mindravaged = 26, waterbonds = 26, trueblind = 26, silenced = 26, hatred = 26, deteriorate = 26, entropy = 26, scrambledbrains = 26, revealed = 26, timeflux = 26, dehydrated = 26, homunculusmercury = 26, kaisurge = 26, pinshot = 26, disrupted = 9, slimeobscure = 26, insomnia = 26, vitrified = 26, phlogisticated = 26, voidfisted = 26, vitiated = 26, deafness = 26, hamstrung = 26, inquisition = 26, blindness = 26, prone = 9, impaled = 6, kkractlebrand = 25, daeggerimpale = 6, voyria = 9, muddled = 26, ensorcelled = 26, deathsickness = 26, sandfever = 4, rebbies = 7, mycalium = 7, flushings = 7, pyramides = 7, }, defup = {}, keepup = {}, options = { ["curing"] = "on", ["curing afflictions"] = "on", ["curing defenses"] = "on", ["curing sipping"] = "on", ["curing transmutation"] = "on", ["curing fallback"] = "on", ["curing siphealth"] = 82, ["curing sipmana"] = 82, ["curing mosshealth"] = 75, ["curing mossmana"] = 75, ["curing priority"] = "health", ["curing focus"] = "on", ["curing focusing"] = "first", ["curing tree"] = "on", ["curing insomnia"] = "on", ["curing mount"] = "clear", ["curing usevault"] = "on", ["curing useclot"] = "on", ["curing clotat"] = "1000", ["curing manathreshold"] = 70, ["curing batch"] = "on", ["curing healthaffsabove"] = 70, ["curing clothealth"] = 70, }, }

Script.name: run installation
Script.script: ar.install.runInstall = function(event) if event == "ar.install.startInstall" then ar.skills.iHave() send("config advancedcuring on") send("config commandseparator |") send("config killwarning on") send("config screenwidth 0") send("config UniversalAfflictionMessages off") send("config ShowQueueAlerts on") send("class list") send("cureset list") send("curing tree scenario list") end if event == "ar.install.deletedPriorSettings" then ar.install.progress.deletepriorsettings = true end if event == "ar.install.treeScenarioInstall" then ar.install.progress.treescenarios = true end if event == "ar.install.curesetInstall" then ar.install.progress.curesets = true table.save(ars.file .. "/curesets", ars.curesets) end if ar.install.progress.deletepriorsettings == true and ar.install.progress.treescenarios == true and ar.install.progress.curesets == true then ar.install.installed = true disableTrigger("ar installation - DO NOT UNLOCK") table.save(ar.file .. "/installation/installTable", ar.install) if ar.install.progress.installedEcho == false then tempTimer( 2, [[cecho("<white> AR INSTALLED! Thank you for your time, ]] .. gmcp.Char.Name.name .. [[")]], false ) ar.install.progress.installedEcho = true end end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.startInstall", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.deletedPriorSettings", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.treeScenarioInstall", "ar.install.runInstall") registerAnonymousEventHandler("ar.install.curesetInstall", "ar.install.runInstall")
